info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 31 at 10:42PM CDT until May 31 at 11:45PM CDT by NWS Lubbock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Lubbock Texas has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Floyd County in northwestern Texas... Motley County in northwestern Texas... Cottle County in northwestern Texas... Northeastern Hale County in northwestern Texas... * Until 1145 PM CDT. * At 1041 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 5 miles southwest of Aiken to 6 miles southeast of Cee Vee, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. * Locations impacted include... Plainview, Floydada, Paducah, Matador, Lockney, Flomot, Cee Vee, South Plains, Aiken, Northfield, Swearingen and Seth Ward. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
